syafiq-jay.name: Syafiq J
syafiq-jay.bio: Syafiq engineers every Tuesday Speed Work session, dialing in paces and recoveries so the crew can stack quick turnover without burning out.

ijlal-zul.name: Ijlal Zul
ijlal-zul.bio: Ijlal translates performance data into punchy interval blocks, keeping runners activated with smart drills and tempo finishes.

liyana-ridge.name: Liyana Ridge
liyana-ridge.bio: Liyana scouts new routes around Selangor weekly, blending runnable climbs with teachable moments on footwork and safety.

ken-moss.name: Ken Moss
ken-moss.bio: Ken handles gradient prep, layering strength cues with downhill control so the crew stays quick and injury-free.

haris-volt.name: Haris Volt
haris-volt.bio: Haris stitches strength blocks into the weekly calendar, anchoring runners with cues on muscle activation and mobility.

aida-form.name: Aida Form
aida-form.bio: Aida fronts mobility labs and helps runners decode recovery metrics so they can stand at the line fresh and confident.

nadia-circuit.name: Nadia Circuit
nadia-circuit.bio: Nadia choreographs city loops that stitch KL landmarks with safe crossings, keeping night runs smooth and cinematic.

johan-pulse.name: Johan Pulse
johan-pulse.bio: Johan keeps the peloton tidy, calling out pace cues, traffic alerts, and energy checks every kilometer.

farid-miles.name: Farid Miles
farid-miles.bio: Farid scripts long run progressions, balancing nutrition stops and conversation pace to keep everyone stacking volume.

salma-drift.name: Salma Drift
salma-drift.bio: Salma dials hydration plans and teaches micro-interval cues so runners learn how to finish strong on patient miles.
highlights: Host, Fuel for Miles micro sessions

amir-summit.name: Amir Summit
amir-summit.bio: Amir maps out weekend hikings with leave-no-trace lessons and beginner-friendly pacing on the climbs.

hana-grove.name: Hana Grove
hana-grove.bio: Hana introduces flora facts and breathing drills, making every hike a reset for runners and their families.

suri-ember.name: Suri Ember
suri-ember.bio: Suri plans brutal back-to-back mileage weekends and coaches mental reps for long solo efforts.

malik-steel.name: Malik Steel
malik-steel.bio: Malik handles strength blocks, hill repeats, and gear checks so the ultra crew stays ready for huge vert weeks.

nisa-othman.name: Nisa Othman
nisa-othman.bio: Nisa captures the club heartbeat, directing photo stories and powering launch reels for every big block.

afiq-xilantra.name: Afiq Xilantra
afiq-xilantra.bio: Afiq scripts the copy, edits highlight reels, and keeps the crewâ€™s tone sharp across newsletters and socials.
